status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The buttons like 'publish status with graph api','publish wall post with graph api'& 'publish wall post with graph api' are missing from the publish stream page.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on mashups tab.
6.Tap on the facebook table row.
7.Tap on the publish stream table row.
8.Notice that you just see a facebook login button where as 'publish status with graph api','publish wall post with graph api' are missing.
9.Tapping on the facebook login button does nothing we just get a button press animation.

Actual result:
1.Buttons 'publish status with graph api','publish wall post with graph api','publish wall post with a dialog' are missing & tapping on the facebook login button does nothing.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on the login button should show us the facebook login page.
2.Tapping on publish stream with graph api should give us an Alert :success.Log into facebook account & look for appcelerator logo posted which says <times> ago via Titanium Appcelerator.
3.Tapping on publish stream with graph api should give us an Alert :Success. Look for wall post use Mozilla online javascript reference.
4.Tapping on publish wall post with a dialog should give us an Alert :Success.Look for the wall post you typed in..on the webpage.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Mashups-->facebook-->publish stream : The buttons like 'publish status with graph api','publish wall post with graph api'& 'publish wall post with graph api' are missing from the publish stream page.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206071457
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120608070223
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows phone mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
